name: mpeg.js
description: A Mpeg-TS Demuxer, with fast speed, you need to get the wasm source from github: https://github.com/numberwolf/MPEG-Demuxer.js, see README.MD
author: numberwolf

scripts.start: cp demuxer/missilets.wasm ./dist/missilets.wasm && browserify ./mpeg.js -o dist/mpeg.js && browserify play.js -o dist/play.js && node server.js
